lines.text: well, he'll have to let you be, cause you're gonna come out smiling
[singing]
if you stick with me.
[Holds up Banjo]
So keep your chin up and look up high. You'll find your troubles will pass you by.

[singing]
I'll stick with you, kid, you stick with me. Together we'll overcome adversity. And old man trouble will have to let you be, 'cause you're gonna come out smilin' if you stick with me.

[Enters stage as crowd cheers and starts singing]
Safety in number, we always work things out. We can't be too careful, there's danger all about. So look 'round each corner, and under bushes too. There could be a prowler who's waiting there for you.
Oh no, Crazy, what'll I do?
What'll you do? I'll tell you what you'll do!
[singing]
I'll stick with you, kid, you stick with me. Together we'll overcome adversity. And old man trouble will have to let you be, 'cause you're gonna come out smilin' if you stick with me.

[singing]
Nature is eating, that's what it's all about.

[singing]
A chicken, a tuna, and now and then a trout.

[singing]
We ain't got the chicken.

[singing]
The tuna can't be found.

[singing]
The truth is we're starving. There ain't no food in town.
Oh no, what'll I do?
What'll you do? I'll tell you what you're gonna do!
[singing]
I'll stick with you, kid, you stick with me.

[singing]
Together we'll overcome adversity. And old man trouble will have to let you be, 'cause you're gonna come out smilin' if you stick with me.
Alright, this kid needs to find a way home! Can you help me find the Chitland Feed Truck?
[Crowd cheers]

[singing]
I'll stick with you, kid, you stick with me.

[singing]
Together we'll overcome adversity. And old man trouble will have to let you be, 'cause you're gonna come out smilin'.

[singing]
You're gonna come out smilin'.

[singing]
You're gonna come out smilin'.

[singing]
You're gonna come out smilin'.

[singing]
You're gonna come out smilin'.

[singing]
You're gonna come out smilin' if you stick with me!
Let's go find that truck!
